modules.description: Provides string manipulation functions such as splitting on delimiters, trimming whitespace, and concatenating with separators. Operates on standard OCaml strings and lists of strings. Used to process log entries by extracting timestamps and formatting error messages.

Splits a string into parts based on specified delimiters, with options to include or exclude empty elements. It processes strings and returns lists of substrings, supporting custom delimiter sets. Used to parse log lines by multiple separators or extract fields from structured text.

Matches strings against a list of patterns, replacing substrings based on defined rules and flags. Operates on variables, character sets, and custom matcher/replacer types to handle pattern-based text manipulation. Used for parsing and transforming structured text with named variables and character class definitions.

Provides string search and manipulation operations including finding substring indices, reverse indices, and occurrences, as well as replacing characters or substrings with custom transformations. Works with strings and lists of strings, supporting efficient pattern matching and text processing. Used for tasks like parsing log files, extracting data from structured text, and generating customized string outputs.
